# OnlineTranslation.ae

> MOJ Certified Legal Translation Services in Dubai. We provide Ministry of Justice certified document translation, attestation, and legalization services across the UAE. WhatsApp-first workflow with 60-minute turnaround on standard drafts.

OnlineTranslation.ae is a Digital Document Concierge platform serving expats, businesses, and legal professionals across Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and the Northern Emirates. Founded in 2018, we specialize in court-accepted translations for immigration, business, and legal proceedings.

**Core Capabilities:**
- 43+ certified language pairs (Arabic-English primary)
- MOJ certified translations accepted by Dubai Courts, DIFC, ADGM
- Same-day express delivery available
- HIPAA-compliant medical translation
- End-to-end attestation coordination (MOFA, embassy, notary)

**Service Process:**
1. Submit documents via WhatsApp or email
2. Receive quote within 15 minutes
3. Translation by certified translators
4. Quality review and MOJ certification
5. Digital or courier delivery

## Services

- [Legal Translation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/services/legal-translation/): Court documents, contracts, corporate governance translation
- [Certificate Translation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/services/certificate-translation/): Birth, marriage, divorce, educational certificates
- [Golden Visa Translation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/services/golden-visa-translation/): Complete immigration document packages
- [Corporate Translation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/services/corporate-translation/): Business and corporate documentation
- [Attestation & Legalisation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/services/attestation-legalisation/): MOFA, embassy, notary workflows
- [Contract Translation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/services/contract-translation/): Specialized contract services

## Industries

- [Banking & Finance](https://onlinetranslation.ae/industries/banking-finance/): Financial reports, regulatory compliance
- [Healthcare](https://onlinetranslation.ae/industries/healthcare/): Medical reports, clinical documents
- [Legal](https://onlinetranslation.ae/industries/legal/): Court documents, litigation materials
- [Real Estate](https://onlinetranslation.ae/industries/real-estate/): Property documents, lease agreements
- [E-Commerce](https://onlinetranslation.ae/industries/e-commerce/): Online business documentation

## Personal Documents

- [Vital Records](https://onlinetranslation.ae/personal/vital-records/): Birth, marriage, divorce, death certificates
- [Academic Documents](https://onlinetranslation.ae/personal/academic/): Degrees, transcripts, educational credentials
- [Immigration Documents](https://onlinetranslation.ae/personal/immigration/): Passports, visas, police clearance

## Legal Specializations

- [Contracts](https://onlinetranslation.ae/legal/contracts/): Lease agreements, MOUs, NDAs, SPAs
- [Corporate Documents](https://onlinetranslation.ae/legal/corporate/): Trade licenses, MOAs, Powers of Attorney
- [Litigation](https://onlinetranslation.ae/legal/litigation/): Pleadings, arbitration, verdicts

## Locations

- [Dubai Marina](https://onlinetranslation.ae/locations/dubai-marina/): Primary location serving JBR, JLT, Marina Walk
- [Business Bay](https://onlinetranslation.ae/locations/business-bay/): Central Dubai coverage
- [Abu Dhabi](https://onlinetranslation.ae/locations/abu-dhabi/): Capital emirate services
- [Sharjah](https://onlinetranslation.ae/locations/sharjah/): Northern Emirates coverage
